item.title: XR Collaboration Startups
item.description: XR Collaboration Startups or: How I Learned to Stop Working and Love the Competition XR‌ collaboration may be the future of work. People and companies can save a lot of time and money from commuting, renting an office and long-distance business travel. I wanted to work on this and created a simple collaboration prototype that runs locally on multiple Oculus Quests and a PC. Unfortunately, this was a mistake. I should have done more research on the competition.
